properties.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 3:50AM MST until February 7 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches.


* WHERE...Northern El Paso County.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening and morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Narrow bands of intense snowfall may cause
rapidly deteriorating travel conditions over short distances.
Locally higher snowfall amounts will be possible if these
snow bands remain anchored over the same location.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY
